author: gartung
body: The circles javascript normalizes on the number of events. The edmModuleAllocToCircles.py script already does normalization on the number of "transitions". "transitions" will be recorded in the output json instead of "events" . The circles javascript will be updated to only perform the normalization when events are in the records.
title: edmModuleAllocToCircles.py use transitions instead of events in module data
